reviewText: My son loves the old Scooby Doo.
My 3 yo gson lives these scooby doo cartoons. Love to rewatch thru new eyes. There are 4 generations enjoying in my household. :)
Gave as a gift to a young boy of six; he and his parents were very pleased.  I was very happy with the quick shipment.
our 4 year old received these for xmas and on saturday mornings watches these so we can sleep in for 30 more mins....  great quality picture.  highly recommend.
my order was shipped the next day ,my granddaughter got her scoobydoo dvdin less than a week, she is happy im happy thanks ,i will use this service again

If you are looking for a gift for a kid, this Scooby Doo set will be really well received.  Our kids (7,6,4) will watch them as often as we will let them.  Even though the animation is crude by today's standards (I was worried it wouldn't engage them), the characters and storylines seem to be timeless in their appeal.  If you area a collector, you might want to consider the complete season 1/2 and 3
while not bad,these same shows can be found along with all the others on the complete 1st and 2nd season set that is out there.because of this i gave this set a 1.

Overall the DVDs were good.  My 2 main complaints were that: 1) 2 of the 3 DVDs had the same episode and 2) Two of the episodes were not from the original series.  One, just had the newer beginning, and a slighlty newer tone to it, while the other had Scooby Dum in it.  The slightly newer episode was not terrible but the episode with Scooby Dum was awful.  I understood these to all be from the original series.  If they would have all been from the original series and no repeats I could have given the Colletion 5 stars.  With 4 out of the 13 episodes not what they should have been, that is 30% of the total.  Hence the 3 star rating.

watching scooby doo is like watching one of your Homeboys getting into things&finding a way out at the last minute. this triple pack contains more drama&another twisted way for Scooby&Crew to warm there way out again.don't a day go by that I don't watch Scooby or do His Famous HMMMMM!!! still the Best Carton I've ever seen. I got Scooby Doo everything.
